edu.wpi.first.wpilibj

Interface MotorSafety

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DifferentialDrive, Jaguar, KilloughDrive, MecanumDrive, PWMSpeedController, PWMTalonSRX, Relay, RobotDrive, RobotDriveBase, SafePWM, SD540, Spark, Talon, Victor, VictorSP

    public interface MotorSafety
    Shuts off motors when their outputs aren't updated often enough.
